metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24889 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in LibRaw version < 20.0LibRaw::GetNormalizedModel in src/metadata/normalize_model.cpp may lead tocontext-dependent arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
